tool_description: Processes multiple text inputs simultaneously for batch text-to-speech conversion, managing queue priorities and resource allocation for efficient bulk processing.

text_list.description: Array of texts to process in batch

voice_profile_id.description: Voice profile to use for all texts

priority_levels.description: Priority levels for each text (1-5, higher is more urgent)

processing_mode.description: Processing mode: sequential, parallel, or adaptive

max_concurrent.description: Maximum concurrent processes for parallel mode

output_format.description: Output format for all generated audio files

quality_check.description: Perform quality analysis on generated audio

error_messages: Empty text list: Provide at least one text for batch processing.
Text list too large: Maximum 100 texts allowed per batch.
Priority mismatch: Priority levels array must match text list length if provided.
Invalid processing mode: Use sequential, parallel, or adaptive.
Invalid concurrent limit: max_concurrent must be between 1 and 10.
Invalid priority level: Priority values must be between 1 and 5.
usage: Provide text_list and voice_profile_id. Optionally configure priority_levels, processing_mode, max_concurrent, output_format, and quality_check. Returns batch processing results and metadata.

batch_id.description: Unique identifier for the batch processing job

estimated_completion.description: Estimated completion time in ISO 8601 format
